(Guess who pointed out Zardus' faults?  Me!  The future ruler of the 
Alliance.  After Zardus dies of...natural causes, because he is no longer 
perfect)

The Oblitercons:


Dark One, already in jet mode, with his inside him, decides to form 
Oblitertron.  Landing on the ground, he opened his cokcpit, Hiss hopping out. 
 Transforming to robot mode, Dark One watched his men go to robot mode and 
come to him.

"Oblitercons, unite!" he yelled loudly, jumping into the air, transforming 
into the shape of a torso and waist.

Breakdown transformed into the right arm and attached to Dark One.

Pyro transformed into the left arm, attaching to Dark One.

Hiss transformed into the right leg, attaching to the appropriate position.

Scavenger transformed into a left leg, attaching on the opposite side of Hiss.

Oblitertron, standing at 13.176 meters in height, Oblitertron let out a roar 
that could out do a pack of lions.  Slamming his right arm against his chest 
as Dark One easily took control of the gestalt from all the other 
personalities.

"WE WILL CRUSH MAFIA, WE WILL OBLITERATE THEM ALL!!!" he yelled, his large 
laser pistol appearing in his left hand from subspace.  He looked around for 
a suitable target.
